fmu.ui.header: Finde Meine Updates Alle mods, die versionsüberprüfung unterstützen, werden hier aufgelistet
fmu.warning.hint: Du kannst diese Nachricht in den Mod Einstellungen deaktivieren
fmu.warning.urlcheck: Bist du sicher, dass du diesen Link öffnen möchtest? :: {0}
fmu.logfile.updated: {0} ist auf dem neuesten Stand. Du verwendest {1} und die neueste verfügbare version ist {2}
fmu.logfile.overdated: {0} ist mehr als auf dem neuesten Stand. Du verwendest {1} und die neueste verfügbare version ist {2}
fmu.logfile.outdated: {0} ist veraltet. Du verwendest {1} und die neueste verfügbare version ist {2}
fmu.logfile.errordb.ArgsNotString: Received a mod message with invalid args: Must be a string!
fmu.logfile.errordb.ArgsEmptyString: Received a mod message with invalid args: Must not be empty!
fmu.logfile.errordb.InvalidUrl: Received a mod message with invalid URL: Failed to parse as URL! ({0})
fmu.logfile.errordb.InvalidUrlScheme: Received a mod message with invalid URL: Must be HTTP or HTTPS! ({0})
fmu.logfile.errordb.InvalidUrlExtension: Received a mod message with invalid URL: Must lead directly to a JSON file! ({0})
fmu.logfile.errordb.NotFound404: Received a mod message with invalid URL: 404 not found! ({0})
fmu.logfile.errordb.NetworkOrHttpError: Received a mod message with valid URL, but web request failed: Network/HTTP error! ({0})
fmu.logfile.errordb.NullDownloadedText: Received a mod message with valid URL, but web request failed: Returned null text from URL! ({0})
fmu.logfile.errordb.JsonDeserializationF: Received a mod message with valid URL, but invalid JSON: Could not parse information from JSON! ({0})
fmu.logfile.errordb.JsonNullAfterDeseria: Received a mod message with valid URL, but invalid JSON: Could not parse information from JSON! ({0})
fmu.logfile.errordb.InvalidVersionFormat: Received a mod message with valid URL, but invalid JSON data: Could not parse 'LatestVersion' as a 'System.Version'! ({0})
fmu.logfile.errordb.CurrentVersionNotFou: Received a mod message with valid URL, but invalid JSON data: Could not find a mod named '{0}' that is currently loaded! ({1})
